entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 09:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SSW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
